modName: RavenNights Tower of the Divines-A Mages Home
summary: A mystical Dwemer tower of mysterious origin once found, will become a welcomed peaceful home for any powerful Magi.
descriptionHtml:
A mystical Dwemer tower of mysterious origin once found, will become a welcomed peaceful home for any powerful Magi.

This new player home is specifically designed with the Mage-type in mind, brought to you from the minds of RavenNight Designs.

There is a courier quest set to this home to guide our heroes to it. However, this IS My first ever attempt at any type of quest modding, so please, leave a comment and let Me know if I\'ve messed it up, and if you know how, how to fix it. LoL

Rate, comment, endorse and/or donate, or any combination of the sort is greatly appreciated. Thanks!
____________________________________________________________
Version History:

v1.0 - Initial release.

author: CaptRaven
